name: Last Stand (Wafflefish)
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Story:

Separated in an abandoned warehouse, you and your best friend Steve must survive the oncoming onslaught of zombies. You're running for your life against this devouring swarm with no way to protect yourself. Luckily, Steve climbed all the way to the rafters and found some explosive barrels in order to defend you from the zombies. Now your friendship will truly be tested. How well can you work with Steve until succumb to

TLDR (Objective):

Character on the ground must run away from the zombies and try not to get attacked

Steve on the rafters drops barrels and kills the zombies.

Survive for as long as you can.

Controls

Action
Key bind
Alt Key bind
Switch Characters
Q
Move Forward
W
Up arrow key
Move Backward
SDown arrow key
Look Right
DRight arrow key
Look Left
ALeft arrow key
Look Up
RScroll Wheel up
Look Down
FScroll Wheel down
Toggle Tap Movement
LShiftRShift
Escape Menu
Esc

Extra Controls for Steve

ActionKey bind
Alt Key bindDrop Barrel
ELeft Mouse Button
Look Straight Down
ZRight Mouse Button

Side notes:

Dropping a barrel takes ~3 secs to fall and when they touchdown it'll explode killing all zombies in a 3x3 centered at the impact point.  Also, explosive barrels don't affect you.

You can hold down W / Up arrow to go forward at a certain rate. Toggling tap movement means you have to press the forward each time you want to go forward. You can move faster with tap movement and spamming , but it's very tiring.

Know Bugs

- Trying to go through the walls of the buildings can glitch out your coordinates and mess with all the hitboxes

Credits
Assets from Kennyl's website / itchio.

Music by Legacynical
